title: Did a jury find that a cop lied about a fatal shooting, but Brett Cavanaugh threw away the verdict?
subtitle: Judge Brett Cavanaugh once sentenced a police officer to fire at the victim ' s family, which prevented him from receiving financial compensation from a jury that had granted him. However, another part of this provision was in the interest of the family.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: After an out-of-service police officer shot Brian Handley, a jury found that the officer acted negligently and lied about the incident, but Judge Brett Cavanaugh reversed the result.
